That's a JUnit 3 style test suite. To use such a suite with JUnit 4, you 
need to annotate the class with

@Runwith(AllTests.class)

Or you could instead use a JUnit 4 suite, using the Suite runner and the 
SuiteClasses annotation.

Cheers, Ilja
